Html:
Hi,

How can I increase the spacing between each star?

Regards,

Dev.

You have to change the stars image and simply add more whitespace to the sides. In addition you'll have to change the starWidth setting in the plugin.

Gidon

Sent from my iPhone

On 8 ביול 2011, at 20:47, "devc" <notifications@codeplex.com> wrote:

From: devc

Hi,

How can I increase the spacing between each star?

Regards,

Dev.
